node.description: Two video games created with a team during two 48 hours long events (Utopiales Game Jam and Global Game Jam). I was in charge of the programming part, using Unity and Unreal Engine.
node.title: Game Jams

node.description: A Unity asset to resize, rotate, and translate 2D sprites during runtime in Unity. It is published for free on Unity's official asset store.
node.title: Runtime 2D Transform Interactor

node.description: A simple Nintendo Entertainment System (NES) emulator written in the Rust programming language. The purpose of this emulator was for me to learn how the NES works and to challenge myself.
node.title: Nesmulator

node.description: I trained a Generative Adversarial Network (GAN) to generate images of new Pok√©mon. I created an API using Flask and a frontend to interact with the trained model (temporarily unavailable)
node.title: Pokemon Generator

node.description: This website was created using Gatsby and Bootstrap, and deployed on GitHub pages. The source code is available on my GitHub.
node.title: This website
